rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Staunch Shield[/i] – As long as Dedue, Fortress Knight is blocking, he has indestructible.
[i]Pavise[/i] – Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to Knights and Nobles you control.
[i]Willing Sacrifice[/i] – Sacrifice Dedue, Fortress Knight: Create a 7/7 black Giant Demon Beast creature token with trample for each creature you sacrificed this turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{W}
